title: CAN'T GET PAST 33% ON LEGACY CLIENT FOR 6.24 UPDATE
body:
WASN'T WORKING LAST NIGHT EITHER

THANKS FOR THE NEW SEASON, CAN'T EVEN PLAY IT

WHAT A GAME

replies.body: At this point, the patcher is trying to establish communication with the patching servers but is somehow being blocked.  You could have a setting or connection issue preventing it, so I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Make sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KwTQpEeM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-08T16:52:33.653+0000)
>
> At this point, the patcher is trying to establish communication with the patching servers but is somehow being blocked.  You could have a setting or connection issue preventing it, so I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Make sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I've tried:

downloading the hextech repair tool and forcing repatch. "everything is okay" but patch still stops at 33%.

Configuring to public DNS 8888/8844 and flush. Didn't work.

Tried turning off firewall. Didn't work.

I am already on a wired connection.

And rebooting of course.

?????????

I appreciate the effort!  It's really important to go over everything, though, to make sure everything is covered.  If nothing helps, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a look.  You should have obtained some logs through the hextech repair tool, attach them to the ticket for more context.  We'll reply back to the ticket asap!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KwTQpEeM,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-08T18:13:58.014+0000)
>
> I appreciate the effort!  It's really important to go over everything, though, to make sure everything is covered.  If nothing helps, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a look.  You should have obtained some logs through the hextech repair tool, attach them to the ticket for more context.  We'll reply back to the ticket asap!

Is there a way I can download and install the new alpha client WITHOUT patching and accessing through the legacy client?
Nope, the updated client currently uses the same files and there's no standalone version.  You can return to the legacy client at anytime without downloading the updated client.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KwTQpEeM,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-08T18:38:16.068+0000)
>
> Nope, the updated client currently uses the same files and there's no standalone version.  You can return to the legacy client at anytime without downloading the updated client.

Okay, figured it out and fixed. I was using the client in korean and had the locale set accordingly. Also can be fixed by changing to another server and patching that way.

I can manually start the alpha client download by changing the launcher.cfg and leagueClientOptIn = yes
